text: Josh Earnest (born March 10, 1977) is an American politician. He was the White House Assistant for Barack Obama. In June 2014, Earnest became White House Press Secretary succeeding Jay Carney. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:White House Press Secretaries Category:Politicians from Kansas City, Missouri Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Josh Earnest
